Articles.Content:
I'm not new to KSP- I think I bought the game just before 0.18 was released and since then I've visited Mun and Minmus multiple times, as well as Eve and Duna, though I prefer doing stuff in LKO like building space stations. I am new to the forums though, so hello everyone!

It's been a little while since I last played the game but The Winter Owl's new series has convinced me to return to it, this time with a heavily modded approach. Decided to start a new sandbox game to build space stations using TAC Life Support, and launched my first tentative steps in that direction today:

https://imgur.com/a/Qjw1u

Welcome to the forums.

That's some good stations you got there.
